giftDescription: Add a personalized message and send this subscription as a gift

included.question: What's included in the premium subscription?
included.answer: Premium subscribers get unlimited access to our entire library of stories, in all available languages. You'll also enjoy ad-free experience, ability to download stories for offline listening, and priority access to new features.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will remain until the end of your current billing cycle.

gift.question: How does the "Send as a Gift" feature work?
gift.answer: When you select "Send as a Gift," you'll be able to enter the recipient's email address and add a personalized message. They'll receive an email with instructions on how to activate their subscription. This option is only available for yearly plans.

lifetime.question: What happens after my lifetime subscription?
lifetime.answer: The lifetime subscription gives you unlimited access to all current and future content on Dolphoon forever, with no additional payments required.
